text: E. Jean Carroll's Lawyer: Trump Told Me ‘See You Next Tuesday’  —  ALL CLASS  —  Roberta Kaplan, the attorney who represented E. Jean Carroll in her successful lawsuit against Donald Trump, says the ex-president used a vulgarity on her at the end of a deposition at Mar-a-Lago.
